text.__SUMMARY__: Persea brenesii is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is endemic to Costa Rica.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Persea brenesii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30667A9570704. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30667A9570704.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
